name: Robot Rush
description:
Collect the keys and upgrades to escape this mini-metroidvania.

Follow Dark Wall Games on Twitter

CONTROLS

  • Move Left - Left Arrow or "A" Key
  • Move Right - Right Arrow or "D" Key
  • Map/Inventory - "M" Key
  • Jump - Control
  • Reset Game - "R" Key

This game was developed in one month as part of a one game a month challenge. I created six games in six months using GameMaker.
